tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collection_time TIME,
  collection_area VARCHAR(50),
  collection_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_date DATE,
    collection_time TIME,
    collection_zone VARCHAR(50),
    truck_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionRoutes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(100),
    starting_point VARCHAR(100),
    ending_point VARCHAR(100),
    route_distance DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE GarbageCollectionHistory (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_date DATE,
    collection_time TIME,
    route_id INT,
    truck_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id UUID REFERENCES WasteCollectionRoute(route_id),
    location_id UUID REFERENCES WasteManagementLocation(location_id),
    schedule_date DATE NOT NULL,
    schedule_time TIME NOT NULL
);
